patthana18.4:1.1_0: Nahetu appaccayo dhammo nanahetussa naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …pe… nahetu appaccayo dhammo nahetussa naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.4:1.1_1: Nahetu appaccayo dhammo nahetussa naappaccayassa ca nanahetussa naappaccayassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.4:3.1_0: Nahetu sanidassano dhammo nanahetussa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.4:3.1_1: Nahetu sanidassano dhammo nahetussa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana18.4:3.1_2: Nahetu sanidassano dhammo nahetussa nasanidassanassa ca nanahetussa nasanidassanassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi,
patthana18.4:3.1_3: adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.4:4.1_0: Hetuṁ anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana18.4:5.1_0: Nahetuṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ,
patthana18.4:6.1_0: Hetuṁ appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana18.4:6.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.4:7.1_0: Nahetuṁ rūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu narūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana18.4:8.1_0: Hetuṁ arūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu naarūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana18.4:9.1_0: Nahetuṁ lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.4:10.1_0: Hetuṁ lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.4:10.1_1: Nahetuṁ lokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.4:10.1_2: Hetuṁ lokuttarañca nahetuṁ lokuttarañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nalokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana18.4:11.1_0: Hetuṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.4:12.1_0: Hetuṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nanakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
